name: Blue Kush
description: Blue Kush, a sativa-dominant hybrid, combines the sweet berry flavors of Blueberry with the powerful and pungent OG Kush. With hints of pine, lemon, and berries, Dinafem Seeds has created a treat for all of the senses. The effects are reported as cerebral, uplifting, and will leave you feeling anything but blue.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Tingly, Uplifted, Euphoric, Depression, Pain, Stress, Nausea, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Paranoid
